error.access_denied: The access to the backup path has been denied. Please check the permissions of the backup path.
error.invalid_method: The server does not support the required methods. Please check whether you have the correct URL. Check with your provider for the correct URL.

data_description.backup_path: Define the path where the backups should be located (will be created automatically if it does not exist).
data_description.password: The password for the WebDAV server.
data_description.url: The URL of the WebDAV server. Check with your provider for the correct URL.
data_description.username: The username for the WebDAV server.
data_description.verify_ssl: Whether to verify the SSL certificate of the server. If you are using a self-signed certificate, do not select this option.
